attributes.action: Allow students to work online if they don’t feel safe going back to school
attributes.background: Allow students who don’t feel safe going back to school and students who live with vulnerable family members to be able to work from home and carry on with online school

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require schools to provide online classes as an option to all children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575392
